name: Make10RightNow
description:
Make10RightNow, developed by Shock Lightening (Established in 2014) is the cumulative result of innovative design, inventive play, and stunning technology. A masterpiece on every level, Make10RightNow is a next-gen game featuring enchanced mechanics, game-play, and rendering. It's a masterpiece. Experience intensive sessions that will leave you breathless.

Entrancing Game-Play:

  • Make10RightNow is brimming with profound moments of precision play and mastery, there's no doubt that everyone will find it enjoyable.

  • A different experience everytime, Make10RightNow is a procedural generated world, perfectly fine-tuned to bring the most out of its brimming world straight to you.

  • Tight controls give Make10RightNow the precision we think every player deserves, feel as if you're flying, as if you're falling. Take in every inch of this incredible experience.

Follow us on twitter @shocklightening

Feel free to contact us on twitter or by e-mail

  • shocklightening@gmail.com
